Home.description: A fullstack software engineer based in Brazil. With expertise in building high-quality mobile apps and websites.

Projects.title: Featured Projects
Projects.description: Here are some projects I've worked on recently. Helping my clients achieve their goals.

project_1.title: Web dashboard SL Treinos
project_1.description: Complete dashboard, which allows the registration and management of exercises, muscle groups and personalized workouts for each student. The application facilitates the organization of training days, exercises, loads, intervals, series and repetitions, in addition to having an intelligent system for calculating volume and automatic load adjustment.

project_2.title: Admin Dashboard
project_2.description: This is a team and project management dashboard, with a modern and intuitive interface, which allows you to customize personal information, such as name, photo and function. In addition, it offers control over the use of storage space and integration with various functionalities, such as plans and notifications. The clean design facilitates navigation and optimizes the user experience.

project_3.title: App SL Treinos
project_3.description: Designed to take the students' experience to a new level. Now, the workouts created by the coaches are accessed directly by the students through an intuitive and easy-to-use app. This ensures that each student has their training plan always at hand, with all the guidance they need to perform their activities efficiently.

Testimonials.title: Testimonials
Testimonials.description: Here's what my clients and co-workers have to say about working with me.

testimonial_1.name: Rodrigo Mota
testimonial_1.text: Miguel Bizzi is a developer committed to code excellence and project quality. Always focused on best practices and details, our partnership is productive and friendly, making working with him a great experience.

testimonial_2.name: Lucas Rezende
testimonial_2.text: I had the opportunity to work as a QA on Miguel Bizzi's team and I can say that he is an exceptional programmer! His technical skills are remarkable, but what really sets him apart is his excellent communication. Miguel knows how to explain complex concepts in an accessible way, which facilitates team collaboration.

testimonial_3.name: Daniel Rabelo
testimonial_3.text: Miguel is a dedicated professional focused on delivering high-quality results. He has an excellent ability to manage time and prioritize the most important tasks, ensuring that projects are always on schedule. In addition, his ability to solve complex problems with creative solutions makes all the difference.
